name: Performance
description:
The Performance Skill governs your ability to perform artistic endeavors such as singing, dancing, acting, or playing a musical instrument. You are almost certainly specialized in one field, although true virtuosos may be talented in many forms of performance.

This Skill represents not only technical know-how, but the ability to work an audience and enrapture them with your show. As with Crafts, you must choose a specialty, even though this Skill also imparts a general sense for watching and responding to your audienceâ€™s mood regardless of medium.

levels.one: You could sing in the church choir.
levels.two: Your Internet videos have over a hundred thousand views.
levels.three: You almost always have a gig booked.
levels.four: You have the talent to be a national sensation.
levels.five: You are a virtuoso without peer.

possessedBy: Musicians, College Students, Actors, Ballerinas, Mimes
specialties: Dancing, Singing, Rock and Roll, Acting, Guitar Solos, Drunken Karaoke
